comments.body:
I suppose the argument could be 'true', or outside the if statement, but no big deal.
Does this have any other side-effects that might break anything?

As we are specifically passing on this flag to Jetty's SSLConfigFactory, I do not see any issues.
This flag's default value is false hence will not take effect until explicitly set.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +83,87 @@         * client certificates. This would help enable mTLS authentication.
         */
        sslContextFactory.setNeedClientAuth(needClientAuth)

      }
